data.title: Hat Thief
data.description:
All of us are a galaxy of tiny little storms.

I don't care where you've been,
How many miles: I still love you.

Happy Nebby is happy.

To date one of my best vector graphics yet, starring Lillie and Cosmog from the generation 7 Pok√©mon games. I've been working on this most days after work since the beginning of this year and I'm quite happy with the way it‚Äôs come out. A few minor annoyances but I'll have to learn from them so I don't repeat them in the future.
